div.p: From the Naturforschende Gesellschaft in Freiburg
RB MSS M200b.12, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: Decorative, illustrated MS, with an oval engraving of a very old view of Freiburg i. Breisgau with the Feldberg in the background below the name of the society.

div.p: Herrn Dr. Ferdinand Mueller in Melbourne

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

p.seg: Die Gesellschaft ersucht Denselben zur Förderung ihrer Zwecke nach Kräften mitzuwirken.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: The Natural History Society of Freiburg in this diploma nominates Dr Ferdinand Mueller in Melbourne as their corresponding member. The Society requests that he will assist in the promotion of its purposes to the best of his ability.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
